question: How many species of animals were recorded in Egypt? question: Who was the architect of the Gregorian calendar? [SEP] sentence: Christopher Clavius, the architect of the Gregorian calendar, noted that the tables agreed neither on the time when the sun passed through the vernal equinox nor on the length of the mean tropical year.

question: When did Isaac Backus write against a state sanctioned religion? [SEP] sentence: In 1773, Isaac Backus, a prominent Baptist minister in New England, wrote against a state sanctioned religion, saying: "Now who can hear Christ declare, that his kingdom is, not of this world, and yet believe that this blending of church and state together can be pleasing to him?"
